Hints.Hint: Hold Shift on the galaxy/zone list to see internal names of the galaxies/zones.
Press Ctrl + N with an object selected to truncate its XYZ position.
In the BCSV Editor, the currently selected column and row number is in the top right.
Is an object in the way? Press H with it selected to toggle its visibility. Alt + H will unhide all objects.
Press Shift + A to pull up the add menu where your cursor is.
Press Space to jump to the selected object in the level view.
Press Shift + Space to jump to the center of the current zone in the level view.
Press Ctrl + C or the copy button to copy the selected object/path. This is put on the clipboard.
Press Ctrl + V or the paste button to paste the copied object/path. This can be pasted between levels or sessions!
Don't forget to save by pressing Ctrl + S.
Need to try curving your path again? Use Ctrl + Shift + Alt + C to reset Path control points!
